cast.name: 贾静雯·阿卡多 Alyssa Accardo

introduction: The dealer, JT aka Skip is a working class hustler, he starts to rebuild his reputation in the neighborhood, his mom discovers his stash of marijuana. Without of a place to live, he crashes with his best friend Frankie, and devises a plan to make enough cash to run away to California. JT's days become a cycle of dealing, watching movies in Frankie's basement, and sneaking into his girlfriend, Kym's bedroom for a quickie. Kym has just told him she loves him, and it stirs up the wildest ideas inside him and he decides to bring her with him to California. But he doesn't have the means ... yet. J's offered a gig dealing cocaine at a party, and one night with the upper class and he and Kym could be on the next train to the land of sunshine, unless something goes wrong.
